comment.author: 92284803@N00
comment._content: From Wikipedia, Archibald Gordon Henry Wilson Moore, "Royal Navy officer who went on to be Third Sea Lord." Uncertain whether it should be "A. G. W. H. Moore" or "A. G. H. W. Moore".

comment.author: 29079609@N02
comment._content: A subject of much scorn from Admiral Beatty for "misunderstanding" his orders during the battle of Dogger Bank, he kept all his forces to attack SMS Blucher rather than proceed and engage the rest of the German fleet. Beatty's flag officer would also send poorly coded flags at Jutland and still was not relived of his duties. Moore was to suffer by being moved to command a cruiser squadron, down from from the lofty battle cruiser heights.

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks to both of you for the additional information.  We'll use some of it to fill in the caption the next time we update the record.
